1: <pb/>Ri Job xubij: <pb/><t>“Ri utzalaj cu'bisabal c'uxaj</t> <t>ri quixcuinic quiya' chwe</t> <t>are' ri qui tatabexic tak ri nu tzij.</t>
3: <t>Chixcoch'onok aretak quinch'awic,</t> <t>c'äte c'u ri', chixtzenok we quiwaj.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Ri nu ch'o'j man ruc' ta jun winak;</t> <t>rumal ri' q'uisnak ri nu coch'onic.</t>
5: <t>We quiya' i xiquin che ri quinbij,</t> <t>quixcanaj can memab rumal xe'n ib.</t>
6: <t>We kas ri in quinchoman che wa',</t> <t>quinxibij wib;</t>
7: <t>¿jasche caquitakej c'aslem</t> <t>ri itzel tak winak,</t> <t>queri'job c'u na e nojinak che cuinem?</t>
8: <t>Quequil qui q'uiyic tak ri calc'ual</t> <t>xukuje' ri qui' tak qui mam,</t> <t>ri man c'o ta caquic'ulmaj pa qui xc'ut.</t>
9: <t>Man c'o ta c'u cacojow u xib</t> <t>ri qui jamaril pa ri cachoch;</t> <t>man cäc'äjisax ta qui wäch</t> <t>rumal ri Dios.</t>
11: <t>Ri e calc'ual</t> <t>cacokatala' tak quib quebetz'en c'ut</t> <t>jacha' ri alaj ama'ib tak chij,</t>
12: <t>ruc' jajatem c'ut quexojowic</t> <t>xukuje' quech'opilajic</t> <t>je jas ri rok'ibal ri arp,</t> <t>ri trompet xukuje' tak ri su'.</t>
13: <t>Caquiq'uis ri qui c'aslemal</t> <t>ruc' tz'ebenic;</t> <t>pa utzil quemukic.</t>
14: <t>Caquibij c'u che ri Dios:</t> <t>‘¡Chujya la can pa jamaril,</t> <t>man cakajtaj queketamaj</t> <t>tak ri pixab la!</t>
15: <t>¿Jachin ri' ri c'o ronojel u cuinem</t> <t>rech cakapatanij?</t> <t>¿Jas cakach'äco chi cäkalok'ok'ej?’</t>
16: <t>(E are' tak c'ut</t> <t>ri banal tak etzelal</t> <t>man quech ta ri c'olem pa utzil.</t> <t>¡Naj chc'ol wi chwe chi quinchomanic</t> <t>e jacha' ri e are'!)</t>
17: <pb/><t>¿Jampa' ta chupinak ri qui chäj</t> <t>ri banal tak etzelal?</t> <t>¿Jampa' ta e kajinak</t> <t>pa jun u q'ueyowal?</t> <t>¿Jampa' ta oyowarinak ri Dios</t> <t>cuc' e u jachom ta c'u</t> <t>pa ri rikoj c'ax?</t>
18: <t>¿Jampa' ta e jabum jacha' ri pajo</t> <t>ri cac'am bic</t> <t>rumal ri sutinel quiakik'?</t>
19: <t>Cäbixic chi ri Dios cubano</t> <t>chi ri e calc'ual</t> <t>e are' quetojow ri qui mac ri qui tat.</t> <t>Kas are' c'ut ri banal etzelal</t> <t>ri rajawaxic cutojo' cusic' c'u u no'j.</t>
20: <t>Rajawaxic c'ut</t> <t>are' ri cäc'äjisax u wäch</t> <t>rumal ri royowal</t> <t>ri c'o ronojel u cuinem.</t>
21: <t>¿Jas ta chi re che ri caquic'ulmaj</t> <t>ri aj uwo rachoch</t> <t>aretak cäminak chic ri are'?</t>
22: <t>(¿Jachin ta c'ut ri cacuinic</t> <t>quebuya' ta tijonic che ri Dios,</t> <t>ri cuk'attzij paquiwi'</t> <t>ri e c'o pa ri caj?)</t>
23: <pb/><t>E c'o jachintak quebopan</t> <t>chuwäch ri cämical</t> <t>e nojinak che qui chuk'ab,</t> <t>sibalaj utz qui banom</t> <t>xukuje' man c'o ta caquicha'.</t>
25: <t>E c'o chi c'u jule',</t> <t>ri xcuc'aj jun c'aslemal</t> <t>re c'ayil quecäm bic</t> <t>man xquina' ta c'u ri ruc'axic bic</t> <t>jun utzalaj c'aslemal.</t>
26: <t>Xak c'u ne,</t> <t>quejunamataj conojel</t> <t>chupam ri quemuk wi;</t> <t>quexjutir na.</t>
27: <t>In weta'm ri qui chomaj chwij</t> <t>xukuje' ri itzel tak chomanic</t> <t>ri e c'o iwuc'.</t>
28: <t>Caquic'otola' c'u qui chi':</t> <t>‘¿Jawije' canajinak wi ri rachoch</t> <t>we banal etzelal ri'</t> <t>ri mawi xtok'obisan ta wächaj?’</t>
29: <t>¿La ma ta ix tzijoninak</t> <t>cuc' tak ri winak ri quebinacatic?</t> <t>¿La ma ta e i tom</t> <t>tak ri jastak ri quequitzijoj:</t>
30: <t>chi aretak coyowar ri Dios,</t> <t>cutak ulok jun u q'ueyowal</t> <t>man c'o ta c'u cuc'ulmaj</t> <t>ri itzel winak?</t>
31: <t>Man c'o ta c'u jun cäq'uikow ta</t> <t>ri u c'aslemal chu palaj,</t> <t>man c'o ta jachin cayo'w jun c'ax</t> <t>che ri takal ta che.</t>
32: <t>Aretak c'u chuq'uisbalil</t> <t>cac'am bic pa mukunajic,</t> <t>conojel caquicholajij quib</t> <t>che rachilaxic bic,</t> <t>jujun quenabej</t> <t>chuwäch jujun queteri' chrij,</t> <t>queboc il che ri u mukic</t> <t>xukuje' ne ri ulew</t> <t>ri camuk wi cux ch'uch'uj che.</t>
34: <pb/><t>¡Xak qui pa k'ij iwib cho</t> <t>che' cho abaj</t> <t>aretak quiwaj quicu'bisaj nu c'u'x!</t> <t>¡Xa banoj tzij ronojel ri quibij!”</t>
